name: IndustryBuilt Software
description:
IndustryBuilt Software provides industry-focused software and services powered by the Microsoft Dynamics platform. At JustFoodERP, we help food processors and food distributors lower their cost, improve food safety, and manage compliance with ERP software and services. At Equip-Soft, we help equipment distributors manage and optimize their rentals, service, sales, parts, and equipment management components of business with ERP software and services.
Each of our business units has a Customer Advisory Council which is comprised of industry peers to help drive our product directions. Our technology is powered by the best in the business, Microsoft Dynamics. When evaluating business software, IndustryBuilt customers realize that industry fit, implementation expertise, product longevity and familiarity are all as important criteria as software functionality and cost. Our customers' continuous improvement is key. Our customers will gain access to a product roadmap and upgrade path that allows them to find and make improvements in their businesses long after their initial implementation.
READ MORE...
